Control Name: BASELINE CONFIGURATION | RETENTION OF PREVIOUS CONFIGURATIONS
Control Statement: The organization retains [Assignment: organization-defined previous versions of baseline configurations of the information system] to support rollback.Supplemental Guidance:  Retaining previous versions of baseline configurations to support rollback may include, for example, hardware, software, firmware, configuration files, and configuration records.
